    "name": "Partial product of prime gaps: a(n) = a(n-1)*(prime(n+1) - prime(n)).",
    "comment": [
        "Original name was: Generated by recursion: a(n)=(Mod[Prime[n+1],Prime[n]]*n[n-1]; a[0]=1; Product of the first n consecutive prime-differences."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Amiram Eldar, <a href=\"/A081411/b081411.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1244</a>"
    ],
    "formula": [
        "Sum_{n>=1} 1/a(n) = A099002. - _Amiram Eldar_, Nov 19 2020"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "a[1] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = a[n - 1] * (Prime[n + 1] - Prime[n]); Array[a, 30] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Nov 19 2020 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(PARI) diff(v)=vector(#v-1,i,v[i+1]-v[i])",
        "pprod(v)=my(t=1); vector(#v,i,t*=v[i])",
        "pprod(diff(primes(50))) \\\\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 27 2014"
    ],

        "Cf. A001223, A080374, A080375, A080376, A099002."
